Package helper

Class InputChecker

java.lang.Object
helper.InputChecker
public class InputChecker extends Object
Helper class for different kinds of input checking from the user.

    static String
    resolveArgument(String response)
    Resolves the argument when an option allows a user to optionally enter 2 arguments like "2 -c"
    The method strips the "-" and any spaces.

      public InputChecker()

  • Method Details

    • resolveArgument

      public static String resolveArgument(String response)
      Resolves the argument when an option allows a user to optionally enter 2 arguments like "2 -c"
      The method strips the "-" and any spaces.
      Parameters:
      response - String input to parse the argument from
      Returns:
      The selected argument

    • dateValidity

      public static boolean dateValidity(String input)
      Checks whether a String input is a valid date.
      Input to be in yyyyMMdd format.
      Dates in the past and dates after 2024 are not permitted
      Parameters:
      input - String input for date, supposed to be in yyyyMMdd format.
      Returns:
      Boolean value on whether the date is valid or not.

    • intValidity

      public static boolean intValidity(String input)
      Checks if integer input is valid.
      Parameters:
      input - String input to check
      Returns:
      Boolean value on whether input integer is valid.

    • parseUserBoolInput

      public static int parseUserBoolInput(String input)
      Helper method to parse Y/N user input responses. Supports lower and uppercase letters.
      Parameters:
      input - User text input when prompted Y/N
      Returns:
      Returns 1 for true, 0 for false and -1 for invalid response.
